Text.Language: Cmou e~nia~/r n~te t~ve: mare peknai nem tekhir/n/ oi n~cobt m~peklaoc: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Bless the air of heaven. May Your mercy and peace be a fortress unto Your people: Save us and have mercy on us.
